name: Jumping Gerbils
description:
gerbil who is fighting to restore his destroyed world. It is a short, simple game with infinite replayability, a 4-directional platform movement system,  cute art, and a charming story that unfolds the longer you survive!

No upgrades, no power-ups, no items ... If you want to advance, you will need to rely purely on your platforming skills!

Features
  • Random generated platforms that move in 4 directions.
  • A day/night cycle that visually indicates progress.
  • Music that audibly signals the completion of a "day."
  • Custom soundtrack. (And custom everything else, including fonts!)
  • In-game shop that uses in-game currency to acquire new balls.
  • 30 unique balls to buy in-game.
  • 5 legendary balls that can only be acquired by accomplishing specific feats.
  • Charming story revealed through dialogue that progresses with the completion of "days."
  • Very challenging. Only the most dedicated players will make it to see the surprise ending!
Minimum System Requirements
  • Windows 7/MacOS 10.10/Linux (32-bit)
  • 1.5 GHz
  • 4 GB RAM
  • OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • 250 MB
  • Keyboard and Mouse
Controls
  • W / Space - Jump / Double Jump (Hold to sustain jump)
  • A - Roll left
  • D - Roll right
  • S - Drop through platform (Hold to fall faster
  • Space/Enter - Confirm
  • Escape/Backspace - Cancel
